page.title: 02Day Visitors to the Forest
page.content: A survey was conducted to find out how many people visit the forest on an average summer Sunday. It was based on the numbers of vehicles parked in official car parks. It was found that by 12:00 {2000} vehicles were parked but by 13:30 that number had reduced to{1500.}However by 15:00 the cars had increased to { {4600.}From that time the vehicle numbers gradually declined until by 21:00 most car parks were virtually empty. If one assumes 2 occupants per vehicle it can be estimated that the population of our area increases by some {9000}people at the weekend.
